Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that U.S. Rep. Elijah Cummings expressed forgiveness towards President Donald Trump on his deathbed. This is not supported by any factual evidence.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on an article from a satirical website and does not provide any credible sources or evidence to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that U.S. Rep. Elijah Cummings had a negative opinion of President Donald Trump and that he expressed forgiveness towards him. There is no evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that it is based on a satirical article, which means it is not a factual recounting of real-life events.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is entirely fictional and not based on any real events or statements made by U.S. Rep. Elijah Cummings.
